title: Sam's Piece: Skypiea Is the Best 'One Piece' Arc and There's Nothing You Can Do About It
author: Sam Leach
description: Editorial analysis praising the Skypiea arc as an incredible stand-alone adventure with fantastic locations, massive scale, layered plot structure, and themes of warring cultures and theological ideals.
relevanceToEpisode: Provides context and analysis of the Skypiea arc which Episode 174 is a key part of, especially regarding the discovery of Shandora

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive recap and review of the Skypiea arc, rating it 7/10 and noting it was visually engaging and emotionally impactful but had challenges with pacing and repetitive action.
relevanceToEpisode: Reviews the entire Skypiea arc including the discovery of Shandora and its significance

title: One Piece: 10 Reasons Why Skypiea Is The Best Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: Article listing ten reasons why Skypiea is considered one of the best arcs, emphasizing its world-building, themes, and connection to the overall story.
relevanceToEpisode: Discusses the importance of Shandora and the Poneglyph discovery which happens in Episode 174

title: How the Most Skipped Arc In One Piece Is Secretly the Most Essential to the Story
author: CBR Staff
description: Analysis of why Skypiea, despite being frequently skipped by viewers, is actually essential to the One Piece story, particularly for its Poneglyph and True History revelations.
relevanceToEpisode: Directly relevant to Episode 174's discovery of the Shandorian Poneglyph and its significance to the overarching plot

title: One Piece: The mysteries surrounding Skypiea
author: Dexerto
description: Article exploring the various mysteries and unanswered questions from the Skypiea arc, including the significance of Shandora and its Poneglyph.
relevanceToEpisode: Analyzes the mysteries introduced in Episode 174 with the discovery of Shandora and the Poneglyph

title: One Piece - Episode 174 - A Mystical City! The Grand Ruins of Shandora!!
author: IMDb
description: IMDb episode page with rating of 7.9/10 and basic plot summary of Robin's discovery of Shandora.
relevanceToEpisode: Direct episode listing with viewer ratings and reviews
